lead_paragraph: The tensions that have simmered at the Aspen Music Festival and School in Colorado since the resignation of its music director, David Zinman, on April 8, boiled over on Thursday.
snippet: The tensions that have simmered at the Aspen Music Festival and School in Colorado since the resignation of its music director, David Zinman, on April 8, boiled over on Thursday.

byline.original: By JAMES R. OESTREICH; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
